attributes.action: Cap Administrators charges when companies are in administration
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Viable companies are being bleed dry by Administrators, so their charges should be capped!
Most senior managers of Administrators, now charge over £450 pounds per hour and the Administrators' offices clerks hours are charge at £75 per hour when they are probably paid the minimum hourly rate!

Administrators strip all the value from companies in administration for themselves and not for the creditors!

Administrators should save companies from going bust and save the jobs of the employees. However, the practice is to accelerate the process of leaving employees without jobs and creditors without payment.

Stop these people today and save Great Britain from mass unemployment!
